subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Sérgio Paulinho of Team RadioShack won a two-man finishing sprint to win Stage 10; the Tour de France’s top overall leaders did not change.
snippet: Sérgio Paulinho of Team RadioShack won a two-man finishing sprint to win Stage 10; the Tour de France’s top overall leaders did not change.
